summary: An ordinance relating to the Water Department, accepting a certain bill of sale from Axel Wickstrom, Howard A. Parker, J. W. Morrison, Inc., and Howard Schroeder of a certain watermain in West 179th Place between 10th Avenue Northwest and a point Five Hundred (500) feet westerly thereof; and in 10th Avenue Northwest from One Hundred and Forty (140) feet more or less south of West 179th Place.
